DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start time of the deviation represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the protocol deviati
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the protocol deviation start time?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: If appropriate, record the start time (as complete as possible) of the protocol deviation in an unambiguous time format (e.g.,., hh:mm:ss). This should be the start or occurrence of the protocol deviation and not the time it was discovered or reported.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DVSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable DVSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.
